about.details:
Freshara Agro Exports Limited, formerly known as Freshara Picklz Exports, was established in 2015 and procures, processes and exports preserved Gherkins and other pickled goods from India to various countries across the world.

Under a contract farming program, the company exports raw produce from local farmers in Tamil Nadu, Karnataka, and some parts of Andhra Pradesh. 70% of the produce is "not ready-to-eat" and is supplied directly to factories for further processing and conversion into finished products. The remaining 30% is supplied to food brokers and traders in the international market. The company's products include gherkins, baby corn, jalapenos, and other pickled vegetables.

As of March 31, 2024, the company processes and exports pickled vegetables in 3 different packaging categories. The details of the 3 packaging categories: 1) Industrial packaging in food grade drums and pails; 2) Food packaging in plastic buckets and tin cans; and 3) Retail packaging in glass jars and tin cans.

The company is accredited by a number of leading organizations, including the Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI), the United States Food & Drug Administration (FDA), Star-K Kosher, Agricultural and Processed Food Products Export Development Authority (APEDA), International Featured Standards, Brand Reputation through Compliance Global Standard (BRCGS).

Competitive strengths:

  • Good relationships with contract farmers and other suppliers ensure the availability of raw materials in the off-season
  • Supporting an efficient supply chain enables the company to maintain long-term and intensive customer relationships
  • Quality assurance and control of product quality, which has earned the company various awards and accreditations
  • Advanced in-house processing facilities with a focus on cost competitiveness
  • A comprehensive product portfolio that enables the company to serve its customers around the world
  • Proven financial performance and a scalable business model
  • Experienced promoter and management team

As of September 30, 2024, the company had a total of 135 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Freshara Agro Exports IPO?
faqs.answer:
Freshara Agro Exports IPO is a SME IPO of 6499200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹75.39 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹116 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on October 17, 2024, and closes on October 21, 2024.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Freshara Agro Exports IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Freshara Agro Exports IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Freshara Agro Exports IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Freshara Agro Exports IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Freshara Agro Exports IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Freshara Agro Exports IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Freshara Agro Exports IPO opens on October 17, 2024 and closes on October 21, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Freshara Agro Exports IPO?
faqs.answer: Freshara Agro Exports IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,39,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Freshara Agro Exports IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Freshara Agro Exports IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Freshara Agro Exports IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Freshara Agro Exports IPO will be done on Tuesday, October 22, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, October 23, 2024. Check the Freshara Agro Exports IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Freshara Agro Exports IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Freshara Agro Exports IPO listing date is on Thursday, October 24, 2024.
